statements: SELECT * FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_name, churn_date FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reason_for_churn FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring WHERE reason_for_churn IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring WHERE subscription_type = 'Basic';
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_type FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring WHERE subscription_type = 'premium';
SELECT customer_name, churn_date FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring WHERE reason_for_churn IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, churn_date FROM customer_churn_rate_monitoring WHERE subscription_type = 'basic' AND reason_for_churn = 'price increase';
SELECT * FROM customer_churn;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_churn ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, churn_rate FROM customer_churn WHERE churn_rate > 3.5;
SELECT customer_id, churn_rate FROM customer_churn ORDER BY churn_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM customer_churn INNER JOIN churn_logs ON customer_churn.customer_id = churn_logs.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_churn WHERE churn_rate > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, churn_rate, email_address FROM customer_churn ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, log_timestamp FROM customer_churn JOIN churn_logs ON customer_churn.customer_id = churn_logs.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM churn_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, churn_rate FROM customer_churn WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM churn_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00');
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM churn_history ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT customer_name, churn_date FROM customers INNER JOIN churn_history ON customers.customer_id = churn_history.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE churn_status = FALSE ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, ch.churn_date, ch.reason FROM customers c INNER JOIN churn_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id;
SELECT cf.feedback_id, c.customer_name, cf.feedback, cf.response FROM customer_feedback cf LEFT JOIN customers c ON cf.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE cf.response IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ChurnRates;
SELECT customer_id, churn_date FROM ChurnRates ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_date FROM ChurnRates;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_date, i.interaction_type FROM CustomerDetails c JOIN CustomerInteractions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Query';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE churn_status=true;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
